name: Ojama Paladin
text:
2 "Ojama" monsters
You can discard 1 "Ojama" card; Special Summon up to 2 "Ojama" monsters from your GY. Once per turn, if an "Ojama" monster you control battles: You can have that monster gain ATK equal to this cardâ€™s current ATK. If this card leaves the field, you can place it in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: Whilst this card is in the Pendulum Zone, neither player can Summon monsters to the Extra Monster Zone.
